name: Fast Food Roulette
description:
Fast Food Roulette is a small casual game in which you try to match four tiles in order to fulfil orders for your fancy fast food restaurant.

Made for the Kenney Jam 2021

In the Kenney Jam, you have to use only the assets provided by Kenney, so it's an interesting challenge to see how you can adapt your idea (and his assets) in order for it to work. 

Rules

The game is played in very short rounds of 90 seconds. The board consists in a grid of food. Moving the mouse lets you select a square group of 4 tiles, and clicking will rotate them 90 degrees. Using only this rotation mechanic, the idea is to match four equal tiles, which have to correspond with the one portrayed in the order slot (located at the left of the screen). If you succeed, you'll gain points and increase your multiplier. If you match a different food, you'll get less points and lose your multiplier.

Controls

  • MOUSE 1 to rotate tiles Clockwise
  • MOUSE 2 to rotate tiles Counter-Clockwise
  • M to disable/enable music

 That's all you need to know.
